notes: Spacious older-style apartment with mixed aesthetics â€” the living room has white built-in cabinetry and tile floors, while the bedrooms feature dated wood-paneled walls, parquet flooring, and older window-mounted AC units. The unit is clean and unfurnished with decent natural light from windows with security grilles. For baby safety, the tile floors are slippery, the open built-in shelving has sharp corners at child height, and the balcony area visible in the living room should be checked for railing gaps; the 2F location means no elevator is critical but the building age (7-story, older construction) makes an elevator unlikely.
